list_definition.definition: a person who edits books etc

list_definition.mean_english: người chịu trách nhiệm một phần của tờ báo
list_definition.definition: a person who is in charge of (part of) a newspaper, journal etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She has been appointed fashion editor.

The editors are to be congratulated for having succeeded in bringing together what are ostensibly ten very different studies into a well-integrated, coherent whole.
In summary though, this is a useful volume which does fulfil the editor's aims.
Neither editor is at fault, but it is another case where the ambiguity of the notation is lost in the precision of the modern edition.
